Batch.Body: { "Binary":"govc", "Command":"dvs.portgroup.kernel.create", "CmdParams": ["-dc={{.global.task.input.Datacenter}}","-host={{.global.task.input.Host}}","-network={{if.global.task.input.Folder}}{{.global.task.input.Folder}}/{{.global.task.input.DistributedVirtualNetwork}}{{else}}{{.global.task.input.Datacenter}}/network/{{.global.task.input.DistributedVirtualNetwork}}{{end}}","-dvs={{if.global.task.input.Folder}}{{.global.task.input.Folder}}/{{.global.task.input.DistributedVirtualSwitch}}{{else}}{{.global.task.input.Datacenter}}/network/{{.global.task.input.DistributedVirtualSwitch}}{{end}}","-mtu={{.global.task.input.MTU}}",{{if eq .global.task.input.IPv4SettingsType.IPv4SettingsTypeOptions "Static"}}"-ip={{.global.task.input.IPv4SettingsType.StaticIp}}","-subnet={{.global.task.input.IPv4SettingsType.SubnetMask}}" {{if index .global.task.input.IPv4SettingsType "GatewayIp"}},"-gateway={{.global.task.input.IPv4SettingsType.GatewayIp}}"{{end}}{{else}}"-dhcp=true"{{end}} {{if .global.task.input.TcpIpStack}}{{if eq .global.task.input.TcpIpStack.HostTcpIpStackOptions "defaultTcpipStack"}},"-tcpIpStack={{.global.task.input.TcpIpStack.HostTcpIpStackOptions}}","-vmotion={{.global.task.input.TcpIpStack.vMotion}}","-provisioning={{.global.task.input.TcpIpStack.ProvisioningTraffic}}","-faultTolerance={{.global.task.input.TcpIpStack.FaultTolerance}}","-management={{.global.task.input.TcpIpStack.Management}}","-vsphereReplication={{.global.task.input.TcpIpStack.vSphereReplicationTraffic}}","-vsphereReplicationNfc={{.global.task.input.TcpIpStack.vSphereReplicationNFCTraffic}}","-vsan={{.global.task.input.TcpIpStack.VirtualSANTraffic}}"{{else if eq .global.task.input.TcpIpStack.HostTcpIpStackOptions "vmotion"}},"-tcpIpStack={{.global.task.input.TcpIpStack.HostTcpIpStackOptions}}"{{else if eq .global.task.input.TcpIpStack.HostTcpIpStackOptions "vSphereProvisioning"}},"-tcpIpStack={{.global.task.input.TcpIpStack.HostTcpIpStackOptions}}"{{else}}""{{end}}{{end}}] }
Batch.Name: NewVirtualMachineKernelPortOndvSwitchImpl

Outcomes.Message: Failed to create VMKernel Adapter on Distributed Virtual Network '{{.global.task.input.DistributedVirtualNetwork}}'. Message: {{.global.NewVirtualMachineKernelPortOndvSwitchImpl.output.HttpStatusMsg}}

Failed to fetch virtual machine kernel adapter '{{.global.NewVirtualMachineKernelPortOndvSwitchImpl.output.deviceName}}'. Message: {{.global.SelectVirtualMachineKernelPortOndvSwitchImpl.output.HttpStatusMsg}}.

VMKernel Adapter '{{.global.NewVirtualMachineKernelPortOndvSwitchImpl.output.deviceName}}' on Virtual Machine Network '{{.global.task.input.DistributedVirtualNetwork}}' created successfully. WARNING :'{{.global.NewVirtualMachineKernelPortOndvSwitchImpl.output.ServiceEnableWarnMsg}}'
VMKernel Adapter '{{.global.NewVirtualMachineKernelPortOndvSwitchImpl.output.deviceName}}' on Virtual Machine Network '{{.global.task.input.DistributedVirtualNetwork}}' created successfully.
